Title: Prohibits the sale of cleaning products containing triclosan, triclocarban or derivatives of such antibacterial compounds
Summary: Prohibits the sale of cleaning products containing triclosan, triclocarban or derivatives of such antibacterial compounds.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of cleaning products containing triclosan, triclocarban or derivatives of such antibacterial compounds
